meanings.definition: A small bus used for transporting passengers on a fixed route.
meanings.sent1: The minibuses arrived at the bus stop to pick up the passengers.
meanings.sent2: The school uses minibuses to take students on field trips.
meanings.sent3: The minibuses decided to have a race to see who could reach the destination first.
meanings.sent4: The minibuses lined up like colorful beads on a string, ready to start their journey.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the minibuses' engines filled the air as they set off on their route.
